question: You are due to start a new job next week but you will not be able to because you have some problems.Write a letter to your new employer. In your letter• explain your situation• describe your problems• tell him/her when you think you can start.
text: Thanks for offering me the position of database administrator in your organization - TTA Inc. My planned joining date is 1 November 2022, however, due to sickness I would not be able to meet the  joining schedule on that date and I would like to postpone my joining date by one week which is  7th November 2022. I am really sorry that I could not join at the scheduled time and because of that, it might have caused some issues with availability.

Let me elaborate my situation, last week when I was travelling to my home town, during the  travel I might have been in close contact with some co-traveller who had flue, due to that, I got severely infected by flue and doctor told me to take a rest for whole next one week.
I hope you understand my situation and accept my apology for not joining on the scheduled day. I will definitely be available on 7th November 2022 at the job location.
